remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承的類別並介面所提供的參考目前 HTTP 要求的物件。Classes that inherit the and interfaces are provided a reference to an object for the current HTTP request. 物件提供內建函式的存取， ，和要求屬性。The object provides access to the intrinsic , , and properties for the request. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此物件可供記憶體回收時完成。This object is ready for garbage collection when the is completed. 在要求完成之後，其使用方式可能會導致未定義的行為，例如。Its usage after the request completes could lead to undefined behavior, such as a . > > 此物件僅供以 ASP.NET 所控制的執行緒。This object is only available in the thread controlled by ASP.NET. 在背景執行緒中的使用方式可能會導致未定義的行為。Usage in background threads could lead to undefined behavior. ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site 專案位於：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192422)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192422). 下列範例示範如何存取及顯示的屬性物件。The following example demonstrates how to access and display properties of the object. 目前 HTTP 要求的內容會使用來存取屬性物件。The context of the current HTTP request is accessed by using the property of the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個旗標未設為`true`，ASP.NET 會擲回例外狀況，當它偵測到應用程式誤用非同步 API。If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API. 如果您嘗試將要求處理管線，其中非同步作業不會，過程中呼叫非同步方法，或沒有仍未完成的非同步工作的非同步模組或處理常式的通知完成時，也可能會發生。This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion. 此行為是要當做防護機制可讓您及早知道是否您正在撰寫非同步程式碼，不符合預期模式，而且可能會有負面的副作用。This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性需要整合式的管線模式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]且至少為.NET Framework 3.0 版。The property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0. 如果有的話，則屬性會傳回值。When available, the property returns a value. 值屬性會指出在哪些事件執行個體目前正在處理要求。The value of the property indicates which event in the instance is currently processing the request. 屬性不是要設定。The property is not intended to be set. 相反地，它由設定[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 管線中的要求處理期間。Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline. 設定屬性將會導致編譯錯誤。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷哪些事件正在處理正在處理目前要求的物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine what event of the object that is handling the current request is being processed. 在此範例中，事件處理常式會處理多個事件的物件，而屬性會決定哪些程式碼會叫用處理每個事件。In the example, the event handler handles several events of the object, and the property determines what code is invoked for each event being handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 整合的模式中才支援屬性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]且至少.NET Framework 3.0。The property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0. 在使用時，屬性會傳回布林值，指出是否在事件物件已完成處理。When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the object has finished processing. 屬性不是要設定。The property is not intended to be set. 相反地，這由提供[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 執行階段，每個通知。Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification. 設定屬性將會導致編譯錯誤。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 在案例中位置的多個事件物件會由一個事件處理常式，您可以使用搭配屬性準確判斷在應用程式生命週期的目前位置的列舉要求是。In scenarios where multiple events of the object are handled by one event handler, you can use the property in combination with the enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷的事件時物件已完成處理所有相關聯的事件處理常式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine when an event of the object has finished processing all the associated event handlers. 在此範例中的自訂事件處理常式會處理多個事件的物件，而屬性用來判斷哪些程式碼會叫用特定的事件處理之後。The custom event handler in this example handles several events of the object, and the property is used to determine what code is invoked after a specific event is handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法類別。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含的預設參考命名空間 (其中包含類別)，您可以參考的成員在.aspx 頁面上，而不需使用完整的類別參考給。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，您可以使用`Request.Browser`以取得用戶端瀏覽器的功能。For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser. 不過，如果您想要使用的成員從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須包含的參考命名空間中的模組，這兩個目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，類別在您想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在程式碼後置頁面中您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 會擲回例外狀況，如果您嘗試使用這個屬性時物件不能使用。ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the object is not available. 比方說，這會在 Application_Start 方法中的 Global.asax 檔案中，或在 Application_Start 方法呼叫的方法，則為 true。For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method. 在該時間有尚未建立任何 HTTP 要求。At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法類別。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含的預設參考命名空間 (其中包含類別)，您可以參考的成員在.aspx 頁面上，而不需使用完整的類別參考給。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，您可以使用`Response.Write("some output")`將輸出寫入至 HTTP 輸出資料流。For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream. 不過，如果您想要使用的成員從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須包含的參考模組和目前作用中的要求/回應內容中的類別的完整的參考中的命名空間您想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在程式碼後置頁面中您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將資源的要求重新導向至不同的路徑，與所要求的 URL 表示。The method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL. 如果您要重設虛擬路徑，以便從伺服器資源的用戶端的要求正確解析，請使用採用此方法的多載`rebaseClientPath`參數並將參數設定為`false`。If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`. 您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面及您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面時，重新撰寫 URL 功能很有用的。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重寫，可讓您以透明方式將要求轉送到新的所在位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果您想要啟用更加易懂易記，並經過最佳化的 Url 用於搜尋引擎的主要站台，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，讓網站以回應不會反映在網站上的檔案結構的 Url。The following example shows how to use the method to enable a Web site to respond to URLs that do not reflect the file structure in the Web site. 程式碼的第一個區塊是名為 RewritePath.aspx ASP.NET 網頁。The first block of code is an ASP.NET Web page that is named RewritePath.aspx. 它需要的查詢字串。It requires a query string. 如果您的網站名稱是 WebSite1，URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1`瀏覽器中顯示 「 第 1 頁 」。If the name of your site is WebSite1, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` displays "Page 1" in the browser. 遵循網頁上的程式碼的區塊是`Application_BeginRequest`Global.asax 檔案中的事件處理常式。The block of code that follows the Web page is the `Application_BeginRequest` event handler in the Global.asax file. 此程式碼會攔截要求的 Url 這類`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`並將它們轉換至它們在處理之前所需的 RewritePath.aspx 表單。This code intercepts requests for URLs such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` and converts them to the form that is required for RewritePath.aspx before they are processed. 因此，URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`會 RewritePath.aspx 叫用與瀏覽器中顯示 「 第 1 頁 」 的查詢字串參數。Therefore, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` invokes RewritePath.aspx with the query-string parameter that displays "Page 1" in the browser. 如果這類的 URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`收到時，多載叫用，可讓您提供值給屬性，以及查詢字串參數。If a URL such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` is received, an overload of is invoked that enables you to provide a value for the property as well as a query string parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫方法`rebaseClientPath`參數設定為`true`。The method is called by the method with the `rebaseClientPath` parameter set to `true`. 若要確保不會修改用來建構資源的路徑的虛擬路徑，將`rebaseClientPath`參數來`false`。To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `rebaseClientPath` parameter to `false`. 您可能想要設定的常見案例`rebaseClientPath`至`false`是當您需要重寫 URL，而且您會使用佈景主題，並將 URL 重新導向至位於不同的資料夾，比要求的資源的資源。A common scenario in which you might want to set `rebaseClientPath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource. 您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面及您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面時，重新撰寫 URL 功能很有用的。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重寫，可讓您以透明方式將要求轉送到新的所在位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果您想要啟用更加易懂易記，並經過最佳化的 Url 用於搜尋引擎的主要站台，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法多載。For a code example, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將要求重新導向資源的另一個資源而不需要變更 URL。The method redirects a request for a resource to another resource without changing the URL. `filePath`參數不包含`pathInfo`參數內容。The `filePath` parameter does not include the `pathInfo` parameter content. Url http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail，則`filePath`參數是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，和`pathInfo`參數是結尾。For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail. 您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面及您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面時，重新撰寫 URL 功能很有用的。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重寫，可讓您以透明方式將要求轉送到新的所在位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果您想要啟用更加易懂易記，並經過最佳化的 Url 用於搜尋引擎的主要站台，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，包括範例的這個方法多載，請參閱方法多載。For a code example, including an example of this method overload, see the method overload.

Url http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail，則`filePath`參數是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，和`pathInfo`參數是結尾。For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail. 若要確保不會修改用來建構資源的路徑的虛擬路徑，將`setClientFilePath`參數來`false`。To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `setClientFilePath` parameter to `false`. 您可能想要設定的常見案例`setClientFilePath`至`false`是當您需要重寫 URL，而且您會使用佈景主題，並將 URL 重新導向至位於不同的資料夾，比要求的資源的資源。A common scenario in which you might want to set `setClientFilePath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource. 您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面及您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面時，重新撰寫 URL 功能很有用的。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重寫，可讓您以透明方式將要求轉送到新的所在位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果您想要啟用更加易懂易記，並經過最佳化的 Url 用於搜尋引擎的主要站台，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法多載。For a code example, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法類別。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含的預設參考命名空間 (其中包含類別)，您可以參考的成員在.aspx 頁面上，而不需使用完整的類別參考給。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，您可以使用`Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`在伺服器上建立 COM 物件的執行個體。For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server. 不過，如果您想要使用的成員從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須包含的參考命名空間中的模組，這兩個目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，類別在您想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在程式碼後置頁面中您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理常式和模組會使用屬性來實作合作式取消，您可能想要停用ASP.NET 預設會執行的要求逾時的行為。將此屬性設定為`false`可以協助您確保取消和清除的常式將會執行不含 asp.net 中斷。In handlers and modules that are using the property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out. Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`false`，ASP.NET 不會自動顯示 「 要求已逾時 」 錯誤頁面發生逾時。If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs. 應用程式負責適當地設定回應內容。The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法介面。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the interface. 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含的預設參考命名空間 (其中包含類別)，您可以參考的成員在.aspx 頁面上，而不需使用完整的類別參考給。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，您可以使用`User.Identity.Name`取得使用者的名稱，其代表目前的處理序正在執行。For example, you can use `User.Identity.Name` to get the name of the user on whose behalf the current process is running. 不過，如果您想要使用的成員從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須包含的參考命名空間中的模組，這兩個目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，類別在您想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在程式碼後置頁面中您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何存取目前的使用者透過屬性屬性。The following example shows how to access properties of the current user through the property. 這些屬性用來設定網頁的標題。Those properties are used to set the title of the Web page. 如果應用程式使用 Windows 驗證，使用者名稱包括網域 」。If the application uses Windows authentication, the user name includes the domain. 比方說，網頁的標題會是"首頁上的 網域 \ 使用者名稱 」。For example, the page title would be "Home page for DOMAIN\username".
